title: [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter, VINTAR 3 Prong Grounded Plug with 2 USB and 2 American Outlets, 4 in 1 Outlet Adaptor Dual USB, AC Outlet Adaptor for USA to Italy Uruguay Chile (Type L)
descriptions:
**[3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter, VINTAR 3 Prong Grounded Plug with 2 USB and 2 American Outlets, 4 in 1 Outlet Adaptor Dual USB, AC Outlet Adaptor for USA to Italy Uruguay Chile (Type L)**

Introducing the [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter by VINTAR. This versatile adapter is designed to provide convenient power solutions when traveling to Italy, Uruguay, Chile, and other compatible countries. With its 4-in-1 outlet design, it is the perfect travel companion for your electronic devices.

**Features:**

- **Input Compatibility:** The adapter accepts Standard N American 2 or 3 prong flat pin plugs, making it compatible with most devices from the United States.
- **Max Capacity:** With a maximum capacity of 2500W, 250V, and 10A, this adapter can handle a wide range of electronic devices.
- **Dual USB Ports:** Equipped with 2 USB ports, each capable of delivering up to 2.4A of power, allowing you to charge your cell phone, tablet, power bank, and other USB devices simultaneously.
- **Grounded 3 Prong Plug:** The adapter features a safe grounded 3 prong plug, ensuring a secure connection to the power source.
- **Compact and Lightweight Design:** Ultra light and compact, this adapter is designed for easy portability, fitting comfortably in your travel bag.
- **Compatible Countries:** Suitable for use in Italy, Uruguay, Chile, Cuba, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Lybia, San Marino, Syria, Vatican City, and more.
- **Quality Certifications:** CE and FCC certified, ensuring high-quality and safe performance.
- **Warranty:** Enjoy a 12-month warranty period for your peace of mind.
- **Friendly Customer Service:** Our customer service team is dedicated to providing friendly and helpful assistance whenever you need it.
- **Voltage Compatibility:** This adapter is compatible with 100V-250V wide voltage devices. Please note that it is not a converter and devices must support 100V-250V dual voltage if not for low power electronics.

Don't let power compatibility issues hinder your travel experience. Get the [3-Pack] Italy Travel Power Adapter by VINTAR and stay connected wherever you go.
